Quickstrike:




Quickstrike looked at KitKat. He wanted to go badly. He needed to get out 
again. Sitting outside the cave wasn't enough. His eyes turned into a 
appearance of wanting. But he knew he was still stuck here.

"Ya could go," he managed to say. "Ah still gotta talk t' Stingtra." That 
bot was worrying him. He had never seen a bot that acted like that before. A 
bot that hurt herself and nearly aways came back damaged.

He looked up and saw Sinester and Sinesis with two other bots. They weren't 
one of his comarades.

"Someone wit' ya?" he shouted over to them.


>From: logomorph@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Thu, 06 Jul 2000 19:24:10 -0000
>
>::KitKat::
>
>She could tell he was bored with it all.  Here he was, a well
>seasoned warrior who was stuck at home base with nothing to do.  She
>felt sorry for him.  He wanted to see some action.  And quite
>frankly, so did she.  She was bored as well.  She wanted to fight.
>Her spark lived for fighting.  She loved bringing down an enemy and
>chewing on his remains.  But she was stuck at home base to with
>nothing to do.  She moved over and sat next to Quickstrike.
>
>"Ok Boss-bot. Now what? Megatron and that mouse aren't back yet.  Do
>you want to go on patrol of do some recon? If we are lucky, we will
>find some bot lurking around to scrap." She had a slight smile on her
>face.  She was trying to comeup with anything to cure the boredom.
>
